scripts.publish: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.publish:rc: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org --npm-tag=rc
scripts.publish:next: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org --npm-tag=next --skip-git
scripts.publish:beta: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org --npm-tag=beta
scripts.publish:test: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org --npm-tag=test --skip-git
